viona.name: Viona
viona.description: A modern booking platform that connects you with the best local service providers. Find, book, and manage appointments effortlessly.
viona.longDescription:
Viona transforms how you discover and book services. Whether it's a haircut, spa treatment, or any personal service, Viona brings the entire experience to your fingertips.

Our intelligent recommendation system learns your preferences and suggests the perfect providers for you. Real-time availability, instant booking confirmations, and seamless payment processing make Viona your go-to companion for self-care.

smartDiscovery.title: Smart Discovery
smartDiscovery.description: AI-powered recommendations based on your preferences and location

realTimeBooking.title: Real-time Booking
realTimeBooking.description: See live availability and book instantly with confirmation

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Pay securely through the app with multiple payment options

reviews.title: Reviews & Ratings
reviews.description: Make informed decisions with verified customer reviews

reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.description: Never miss an appointment with smart notifications

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description: Save your favorite providers for quick rebooking

testimonial.quote: Viona made booking my appointments so much easier. I love how I can see all available slots in real-time!
testimonial.author: Sarah M.

viona-partner.name: Viona Partner
viona-partner.description: The complete business management solution for service providers. Manage bookings, track analytics, and grow your customer base.
viona-partner.longDescription:
Viona Partner empowers service providers with professional tools to manage and grow their business. From appointment management to customer insights, everything you need is in one place.

Track your performance with detailed analytics, manage your team's schedules, and build lasting relationships with your clients through our integrated CRM features.

calendar.title: Calendar Management
calendar.description: Intuitive scheduling system with drag-and-drop functionality

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.description: Comprehensive insights into revenue, bookings, and growth

team.title: Team Management
team.description: Manage staff schedules and permissions effortlessly

crm.title: Customer CRM
crm.description: Build customer profiles and track visit history

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.description: Instant alerts for new bookings and changes

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Showcase your work with a professional portfolio

testimonial.quote: Since switching to Viona Partner, our no-shows dropped by 60% and bookings increased significantly.
testimonial.author: Mike's Barbershop

qr-sessions.name: QR Sessions
qr-sessions.description: Create, share, and manage sessions with QR codes. Perfect for events, classes, meetings, and anywhere attendance matters.
qr-sessions.longDescription:
QR Sessions revolutionizes how you manage attendance and sessions. Generate unique QR codes for any event, share them instantly, and track participation in real-time.

Whether you're running a workshop, managing a classroom, or organizing an event, QR Sessions provides the tools you need to streamline the check-in process and gather valuable attendance data.

qrGeneration.title: Instant QR Generation
qrGeneration.description: Create unique, secure QR codes for any session in seconds

tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor attendance as participants check in live

management.title: Session Management
management.description: Organize and schedule sessions with ease

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Download attendance reports in multiple formats

multiSession.title: Multi-session Events
multiSession.description: Manage complex events with multiple sessions

testimonial.quote: QR Sessions has transformed how we track attendance at our workshops. It's incredibly intuitive!
testimonial.author: Tech Academy

posture-pal.name: PosturePal
posture-pal.description: AI-powered posture monitoring that helps you build healthier habits. Get real-time feedback and improve your posture naturally.
posture-pal.longDescription:
Meet PosturePal, your friendly giraffe companion on the journey to better posture! Using advanced ML-powered pose detection, PosturePal monitors your posture in real-time and provides gentle reminders to help you sit and stand better.

Our charming giraffe mascot makes improving your posture a delightful experience. Track your progress, set goals, and watch as your posture improves day by day.

aiDetection.title: AI Posture Detection
aiDetection.description: Advanced ML Kit integration for accurate pose analysis

feedback.title: Real-time Feedback
feedback.description: Instant notifications when your posture needs correction

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Visualize your improvement over time with detailed stats

mascot.title: Friendly Mascot
mascot.description: Your giraffe companion makes posture training fun

haptic.title: Haptic Feedback
haptic.description: Gentle vibrations remind you to straighten up

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All processing happens on-device for complete privacy

testimonial.quote: The giraffe mascot is adorable and the posture reminders have really helped my back pain!
testimonial.author: Jamie L.

ai-poster.name: AI Poster
ai-poster.description: AI-powered social media automation that generates content and publishes across platforms on schedule. Connect, create, and grow your presence effortlessly.
ai-poster.longDescription:
AI Poster is your intelligent social media companion that takes the hassle out of content creation and publishing. Connect your Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest accounts, and let AI do the heavy lifting.

Our advanced AI generates engaging captions and stunning images tailored to your brand. Schedule posts across multiple platforms, track performance analytics, and watch your social presence grow—all from one powerful dashboard.

aiContent.title: AI Content Generation
aiContent.description: Generate engaging captions and hashtags with advanced AI models

aiImage.title: AI Image Creation
aiImage.description: Create stunning visuals with DALL-E 3 image generation

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Publishing
multiPlatform.description: Post to Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest from one place

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Track engagement metrics and optimize your strategy

security.title: Secure OAuth
security.description: Bank-grade encryption for all your connected accounts

testimonial.quote: AI Poster has transformed how I manage social media for my clients. The AI-generated content is impressive!
testimonial.author: Digital Agency
